content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv inside the house when out of the corner of my eye i saw an orange light go by the front door window higher than what a car headlights would be. it was a commercial so i went outside to see what it was. i then notice there were a few more behind it, so i ran inside to get my binoculars and then grabbed my wife on the way back outside. by this time the first half dozen or so had moved to far away to see anymore. so we looked at the next 5 or so move from left to right before turning and moving away from us. when i ran inside to get the binoculars i thought they were helicopters and that we were seeing the lights from the cockpits. however when we zoomed in on them there were red or green lights as you would see on airplanes or helicopters. i would have to describe them as looking almost like a hot air ballon, but at the speed they were moving i would say thats would be impossible.
content.summary: Multiple (12 or more) orange balls moving and turning at fast speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cousin's home in deansboro, ny.  we were bbqing an amazing london broil on a nice sunny night outside near his garage for dinner, 7pm.  i look up to the sky (because i often do when outside) and say "what are those!?"  we see three separate small white orbs moving silently and effortlessly in a straight line through the sky in a large triangle formation, maybe 200 - 300 ft in the air.  they weren't moving very fast, but weren't moving slow either.  i first thought they were maybe balloons, but the formation they were in i didn't think balloons could maintain in the sky and they didn't even change elevation.  they didn't change direction or speed at all and remained in a perfect large triangular formation.  my cousin kept telling me they were airplanes way up, but those definitely were not airplanes way up or even hot air balloons (no wings, no markings, nothing emitted, no nothing, just 3 perfect spheres)...They were just moving along like nothing was going on.  i kept watching them till i couldn't see them anymore because of the trees and hills.  i wish i had my camera on me so i could provide evidence, but my camera was at home w/ my fishing tackle.  never seen anything like that before and to this day can't think of what they possibly could have been other than a ufo.  maybe surveillance drone, i have no clue, there's nothing much for our gov't to survey here in utica, ny.
content.summary: Bbqing outside w/ my cousin and looked up and saw 3 white spheres in a large triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i, were taking pictures of the downtown lights at night. when my girlfriend saw a strange light which at first she thought was a police car... but the lights were not flashing. then the light floated above any bridge in downtown, then she knew it was not a car! she then got my attention, and instantly i grabbed my camera! i took a picture on accident before i switched my camera to video. i think i got some good footage of it floating way above bridges and even going way below them almost on top of the river, which proves its not a helicopter! it then seems to fade away into nothing after it twinkles red and blue for a quick second! i also still have the raw video on my camera to prove it is unaltered raw film!!! check it out! i posted it on my youtube channel which shows my girlfriend and i talking about it and the footage of the ufo! go to 

[links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Real  ufo caught on video.

content.detailedDescription: My sightings started around 2 or 3 in the afternoon where i would see single ufos just floating through the sky.  a few hours later i starting getting ready to grill and then saw a green object that would go bright then dim over and over.  i watched for about 2 minutes before i lost sight of it.  so about 30 minutes after that (putting the food on the grill now) i i see another object that looks fairly close, (around 15,000) this object was a flashing a very vivid reddish orange color which would get brighter and dimmer over and over.  as i am looking at this object i scan across the sky and see the same green ufo i saw early.  it looked to be at the exact same height as the other ufo and they were in a direct line with each other a short distance away.  these 2 ufos were doing there flashing thing and did not move from there spots.  as i am watching this i see a small red orb appear in the same part of the sky but it looked to be much higher. again, this orb just appeared and sat there as if it were watching the other 2 ufos.  after about 3 more minutes i saw a total of 4 of the red orbs that were higher.  as all this was happening i saw a white orb (looked just like the red ones except it is white) appear and move slowly across the sky through the paths of the 2 ufos.  this event took about 10 minutes and was extremely weird.  my wife and 3 year old daughter witnessed it with me.  my 3 year old says they looked like stars that sparkled, it was cute.  eventually after all the ufos disappeared and moved off i saw a jet fly over where all the ufos were.  the jet was flying high but it looked small and had a single exhaust which to me fits an f-16.  5 minutes after the first f-16 flew by i saw another one fly by going the exact same way.  that was the last thing i saw that evening.
content.summary: I first saw a bright reddish orange object flashing then looked to the left and saw a second object that was a vivid green color.  while these 2 objects sat there i saw several more orb looking ufos appear and watch.  they eventually disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1am there was a lightning storm in the fort erie area.  a few minutes later at approximately 103am right in the middle of the storm, the area went very quiet and i saw some bright lights coming into the bedroom.  i turned around to expect to see some more lightning, but then noticed that the light was coming from a point source above the tree line and it appeared to be just sitting there.  at first i thought it was a streetlight but then realized that it was too hight to be that.  i checked the clock and it was 105am at this point.  i looked back at the bright white light and thought it very odd to be there.  i also looked away a couple of times just to make sure i wasn't "seeing things", but it actually seemed to be there.  it looked light a white flare but it was a reality large one, kind of like a car headlight.  the actual size of the light is difficult to determine, but the location appeared to be over downtown fort erie (maybe).  i stared at it for a couple of more minutes, until it disappeared.  exactly where it went, i am not sure.  i actually don't know if it moved away or just turned off. in any case, after the light disappeared, the storm returned and there was some off bursts of rain that came down.  thats pretty much it, very odd.
content.summary: Bright white light, similar in intensity as a flare.

content.detailedDescription: This is a report i received from my daughter whom i shall refer to as bink. she wishes to remain anonymous. during the concert ozzy was playing the song suicide solution and the audience was looking at ozzy. bink glanced towards the little dipper at the time. a ufo appears away from the stage while everyone (she assumes) was watching towards the stage away from the ufo. this is the report directly. i collected the report as it was fresh in her mind. the shape was triangular with rounded tips. the color of the craft was a pale gray. the middle looking on edgewise was slightly rounded and thicker in the middle, which held 3 round lights in a line strobe-like. colors were green, yellow and pinkish purple. the lights were like a strobe that blinked and flashed 3-5 times before it disappeared behind a tree that it fit behind. bink said the distance was up higher than any conventional aircraft. the craft made no noise but it flew horizontally then flew up then hovered then shook as it left. bink recognized that it was unlike anything she had ever seen before and she seen it as it was (a weird ufo). she has never seen anything like this before and it was the first thing she said to me when she got home that night with her dad who didn't see a thing. she said "guess who just saw a freaking ufo" were her words exactly.
content.summary: Ozz fest ufo seen over devore.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out to put my trash out at approximately 9:30 pm sunday august 15, 2010 and immediately saw a string of 5 bright orange glowing orbs in the sky moving to the north.  i wondered if it was a meteor shower but they were traveling in a row and not burning out and lasted much longer than that. they were moving extremely quickly and in a line one behind the other.   as they got closer they were more brilliant in their glow and i ran inside to grab my camera.   as i emerged 15 seconds later they had already made significant progress and 2 were out of sight.  the object appeared to have almost bug like wings that were also glowing orange.  they were gone before i knew it so obviously not jets....Too fast.  i was able to get one picture as they were almost gone.
content.summary: 5 fast glowing orange orbs over round rock, texas.

content.detailedDescription:
Was watching the sky with my daughter and her husband on top of the haystack a little after 10pm and was commenting that it would be cool to see some plasma craft or a blue spiral. within 5 minutes, what looked like a faint star directly above us drops towards us, flashes a bright blue in a circular shape (thus making it appear much bigger than it had been), and then proceeds to move west as it fades back into the small pinpoint of light it began as. we watched it fly west until it disappeared on the horizon.

if it had not behaved in this manner, coming straight towards us and then make a sharp and fast 90 degree turn to the west, it would have been identical to watching a satellite traverse the sky. in fact, tonight we saw more than a dozen "satellites" up there, and most of them were very fast....

before this sighting, perhaps half an hour earlier, two military jets were observed traveling at a casual pace and in formation towards the north. they were high up, but could be heard as well as seen. we don't usually get military aircraft up this way--but this is the fourth time since spring that we've seen them, and every time there has been a ufo report here on mufon.
content.summary: Pinpoint of light drops down, expands in burst of blue, fades as it makes 90 degree turn and moves like satellite.

content.detailedDescription:
I reported yesterday a brilliant flash occurred over my house last night.

i am  a little offended to be asked if arlington airport ran at night, indicating i may have seen an airplane's strobe, or landing lights, or running lights.

i have lived next to the airport for 30 years. i have seen hundreds of planes landing at night.

i have also seen a tumbling fuel tank at night from a shuttle launch.

i may have been a very large piece of shiny space junk that had a very slow tumble, and i may have seen it at the moment it aligned with the sun, giving it that that one brilliant burst of light.

if anybody has any better suggestion, i would like to know!
content.summary: Maybe space garbage.

content.detailedDescription:
Two witnesses, myself, *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and co-worker **(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms). we were in a pickup truck, driving into a cattle pasture to assist in tagging and weighing a new born calf.  the pasture is in a very rural area of alabama, just off of cobb's landing road, which runs east-west from us hwy 28, between camden and miller's ferry in wicox county.  we were facing east/south-east.  there is no airport in that direction untill the montgomery airport about 80-90 miles east/north-east.  nothing but small towns, pine woods and the alabama river.  the small camden airport about 10 miles to our south.

i saw what appeared to be a white cattle egret fly up from the tree line at the far edge of the pasture.  what caught my attention was that it was solitary, egrets are usually in flocks; that it wasn't flapping it's wings as it rose, it's body position stayed fixed; and that it ascended at a steady 40-45 degree angle.  i watched it a second or two and pointed it out to **(name deleted--cms/sg) when it continued to ascend at a steady slope.  egrets will usually fly up a few feet, level out and glide back down to the field.  this was well above the tree top level of the distant trees, probably 300-400 yards (1/4 mile).  before **(name deleted--cms/sg) could locate it, while i was pointing it out, it dissappeared... vanished.  i was describing what i had just seen to **(name deleted--cms/sg) when it re-appeared, higher in the sky and to the left of where i had last seen it.  it had been ascending from our left to right, going south.  i had watched it for 5-10 seconds before it vanished, and it re-appeared in about the same length of time, still ascending at the same trajectory.  i again pointed it out to **(name deleted--cms/sg) as it climbed higher into the sky and moved farther southward.  it was still brlliant white and didn't seem to be diminishing in size in spite of the distance it was travelling. **(name deleted--cms/sg) still wasn't able to locate it before it dissappeared a second time, then re-appeared again, higher and back to left of it's last position.  

the object repeated this sequence a total of five times. **(name deleted--cms/sg) spotted it on it's fourth and fifth appearances.  i interpretted this trajectory to be a spiralling ascent that carried it upward and southward at about a 45 degree angle.  it seemed to be visible to us only along a portion of it's spiral, possibly due to light reflection from it's surface, and then vanished when the surface angle changed.  on it's fifth appearance it entered the scattered clouds and we lost it.  it did not seem to be smaller when it entered the clouds than it was when i first saw it, which makes me think that it was farther away initially than i had at first thought, possibly even miles away, and that it was much larger than a cattle egret.  

we heard no sound, it left no trail.  it did appear bird shaped, with a fixed wing position.  this was during operation desert storm in kuwait, and i thought that a possible explanation would be a stealth aircraft painted camoglage and we saw it only because we happened to be at the correct angle to catch a reflexion.  the area around miller's ferry is used as a training area by the air national guard out of montgomery.  the reason i'm reporting this is because it certainly did appear to rise from the field or from the trees beyond the field... we did not see it fly into that location.  it rose from that location as if it had been there some time, and i can think of no location a plane could have taken  off from in that direction.

if each acending appearance lasted 5 seconds, then the entire sighting lasted at most a minute.  i guess-tomate the clouds to have been 10,000-15,000 feet at least? - possibly higher?  a direct ascent to 2 miles with 2 mile downrange at a 45 degree ascent would be a distance of 2.8 miles.  the spiral added more distance - depending on how tight the spiral was, another mile? say 4 miles in 1.5 minutes, that's about 240 mph.  a 3 mile climb with 3 mile downrange gives about 360 mph. if the circles of the spiral were large, the distance covered could have been as much as 12 miles, a speed of 720 mph.

from our perspective it appeared to ascend in a straight line, but it must have been a spiral, it's the only way i can explain its dissappearance and re-appearance higher and back to the left. neither it's speed, angle of ascent, or size seemed to change during the sighting. a third co-worker already in the field whom we immediately joined had not noticed the object and was completely unaware of it.
content.summary: White object rose from wooded area and spiralled into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: We were camping over on a friends property. we were sitting around a fire when my 10 year old son noticed a bright distant white light moving across the sky from our left to right. i don't know which way was north in that area. we all looked at it and then suddenly it turn upward at a bout a 60 degree angle and shot into space turning red just before disappearing.
content.summary: Bright distant light streaking across sky then into space.

content.detailedDescription:
I found this photo in my 2008 collection. this ufo image  looks similar to the picture ���������orange light ball and rectangle ufo���������  http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/2010/07/orange-light-ball-and-rectangle-ufo.Html .  are they the same object ?  this picture was captured on 18 dec 2008 8:30:41 am, camera exposure time 1/1000 second.  it shows one orange colored light ball popping out from the black ufo. 
please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: {link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Orange light ball and black ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sat on my bed with my blinds open at 11pm last night, out of the corner of my eye i spotted a red light out of the window. i got up and on closer inspection noticed another one come into view in exactly the same path the one before it had used. i stood at my window trying to make out what they were, at first i thought a plane, but there were no flashing lights to indicate this and the objet was travel much faster than that of a plane.
by 11.15pm i had counted 18 of these objects all using the exact same path as the first one, they were all equal distances apart. i tried to video this but my camera phone would not pick it up.
i was a little bit overwhelmed to be honest and quickly phoned my partner who was away at the time, i explained it all to him in detail.
i managed to make out from three of the objects that they were trapezium in shape, after seeing the last one dissapearing over the housetops towards peterborough, i was actually in a state of disbelief.

i've no doubt in my mind these weren't military or chinese lanterns.

also not sure if this is connected in anyway, but roughly 10 minutes before the first object appeared all the streetlights outside my house went out and came back on after the first two objects had passed.
content.summary: 18 red trapeziam shaped objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking straight up at the stars on my porch, i couldn't sleep and the stars were extra bright. at 2:47 am a bright flash like the flash from an old time flash bulb happened, what seemed maybe 50 yards away, at 12:00 high to me. i looked for aircraft, there was nothing.

i thought it was the strobe from a passing airplane, but there was no sound or any additional flashes, just that one.

after realizing what i had seen was unexplainable, i sat down and filled this report
content.summary: A very bright flash.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard with my 4 year old son watching the perseid meteor shower. he was excited to finally see a shooting star.  we were watching the sky and mostly due to light pollution i suspect, we had very few meteors visible-over the hour we watched together i only saw 5 and my son missed 2 of them and witnessed only 3.  luckily, being 4 years old that was excitement enough for him.  i had planned to allow my son to watch for 30-60 minutes starting at 10 pm as this was way past his bedtime and we made a special occasion out of it.  my wife was tired and went to bed at about 10:15 after seeing nothing for 15 minutes.

my son and i were carefully searching the skies for the perseid show and were spending an extended period of time doing it.  had i not been paying such close attention, i likely would have missed what has instantly become  the strangest thing i have ever seen.  my son saw it as well, but i downplayed it's significance to him due to his young age and not wanting to scare him.  

at about 10:30 i noted what i thought was a star in the sky just like any other except that it seemed to be twinkling more than other stars so i kept my eye on it.  i then realized that it wasn't just twinkling, but actually moving.  it was moving in a way that immediately made me realize it was not a typical fixed wing or rotor aircraft.  at first i took the light to be a very distant object at extreme altitude that was moving perhaps greater distances and with less conventional motion, akin to old videos i have seen on television when people used to watch form the "black mailbox" at area 51, although less dramatic.  fascinated, i pointed it out to my son, who also was able to see "that moving thing" and then as we watched it together i realized that there were 2 more lights below the one that i was looking at that were intermittently visible and had a reddish hue, very dim.  the light i noticed at first was more of a white light that at times twinkled red or blue like a star can do, which is anther reason i at first mistook it for a star.  connecting the dots i realized i was not looking at a craft at extreme altitude represented by a single point of light but rather a triangular craft that had a light on the front and was pointing toward me, perhaps with the nose angled up somewhat, and that this made the 2 lights at what i took to be the back of the craft sometimes visible to me and sometimes not from my vantage point in my yard.  this craft was really close to my house in a very densely populated area so i was surprised that it would just sit there.

but sit there it did, for at least 90 more minutes.  i put my son to bed and went back outside to watch it and took some audio notes i recorded then attempted to take video and photos with my cellphone then video and photos with my 10 mp point and shoot camera.  given how dark it was i ended up going and getting a tripod and mounting the point and shoot to take long night mode exposures as otherwise i knew with the equipment i had on hand there would be nothing visible in the images at all.  i will not attach the images here as even after cleaning up on my computer this object is barely visible due to the black on black and dim lighting.  if mufon wants the images they can contact me and maybe they will have some tricks i don't to bring out more detail, but as i know where to look in the photos i can still see the outline of the craft in them.

the motion of the craft was a hovering, at times nearly motionless, at others sort of what i can only describe as sloppy.  the craft was utterly silent.  based on a visual observation of an occasional faint purple-blue/black plasma like haze misting over the bottom and edges of the craft, i had the impression it was airborne via some type of field it generated.  this was enhanced by the strange manner in which it hovered which was unlike a helicopter and more akin to a blimp but clearly not a blimp either.  the craft at times seemed to struggle to stay in one place as if it were balancing on top of a sphere and occasionally lost it's balance and had to hustle to get back to the perfect center.  this gave me the impression that whoever the pilot was was an amateur.  strange, i know-i expected to assume that the craft was other worldly but my impression was that it was man-made with technology we haven't yet mastered based on what i witnessed in the motion of this craft which was far less precise than what i would have imagined would be the result of an extra-terrestrial race's efforts but maybe i assume too much.  at times the movement seemed like a kite on a string in the wind or perhaps a bobbing balloon.  it just sat there in the sky while i watched and i had the impression it was up there to watch the meteor shower too (another strange impression that made me think it was piloted by a human).  the object was able to move in any direction with equal ease it seemed.  at times it tilted, raised, lowered, scooted forward, scooted straight backwards, all with equal but imperfect dexterity.  at one point it seemed to move a bit out of the way of a passing plane which made me wonder what the pilot of the plane thought or if they saw it at all.  90 minutes after i started watching it almost exactly at midnight cloud cover rolled in and obscured my view of it and since i had to be up early the next morning i went to bed.  i did not witness it's arrival or departure and it stayed in a very small area in the sky throughout my period of observation.

other details of the appearance of this craft include that the triangle was not 3 even sides.  it was a rather sharp triangle like a slice of pizza (though not curved in what i assume is the aft part of the craft).  it lacked a central light or lights around the edges.  only the light in front and the dimmer lights in the rear.  i saw 2 lights in the rear portion at most times but occasionally the nose would tip up enough that i had the suggestion of perhaps more lights on the back as well that perhaps i could have seen from another angle.  it was matte black on all visible portions as far as i could tell but the craft was at some distance from me which i will try and give details about below.  it seemed to be thin from top to bottom which gave it a nearly 2 dimensional quality, like a puppeteer had a paper plane on strings from above.  while watching this object i went on the mufon site and noted another report of the object i was witnessing from my area earlier the same night with the only difference being 5 lights in the back while traveling.  i suspect i witnessed the same craft or one identical to it, as to why it essentially parked over my house i have no idea except as i noted above.

i live in a busy air travel corridor and many aircraft were in the vicinity of this object and most seemed to be flying below it, which was one clue to the object's altitude.  another was the fact that the clouds obscured it when they rolled in, so if someone had data on the altitude of those clouds we could say it was at least that high up.  similarly, with how long it was there, somebody had to have radar hits on this thing.  there are many local airports both ga and commercial in my area and the airspace is tightly controlled.  i suspect it would not be too difficult to get radar data for the area at the time if you knew the right people.  i don't.  but i witnessed both airplanes and clouds under it so it was fairly high up.  

the object's size is tough to say, except that it was clearly quite large given how high up it must have been.  i have some photos with my roofline that could be used to judge scale if nobody can find radar data on this thing.  with my arm outstretched and thumb extended looking along my arm to it, it went from the tip of my thumb past the first knuckle somewhat.  it sounds cliche but it could have been as long as a football field.  

in my excitement when i first was noticing the object i started looking around to see if there were more since it was essentially hiding in plain view in the sky.  of course i connected all possible stars into triangles and thought i may have noted others but quickly realized i could confirm only 1 craft was present.  however, i am absolutely certain of what i saw.  i watched it nonstop except to put my son to bed and grab camera equipment in my home for about 90 minutes total until the clouds rolled in.  it was a physically present object that occluded stars when it moved in front of them and was itself occluded by things passing underneath.  

it moved in ways utterly unlike any aircraft i am aware of and it was too high in altitude and too large to be an object tethered to the ground.  it seemed to be on some type of slippery surface that it had to balance on just right to hover motionless or else sudden clumsy adjustments had to be made to maintain its position, and it seemed to bob a bit like a cork on the ocean.  it is an experience i will certainly never forget and i would be willing to discuss it with mufon investigators if they were so inclined.  otherwise i hope this detailed description helps somebody get to the bottom of what this thing was.  

there are many things i am certain it wasn't.  it is to me in the truest sense of the term unidentified.  a google search of photos of black triangle aircraft seemed to demonstrate that what i saw was less common than many other descriptions/photos out there but it has been seen before.  

i am not sure what significance this has but what will last with me is how this thing was nearly cloaked over my house for such a long period of time motionless in the sky and i could have so easily overlooked it, yet once i saw where it was it seemed like such a bad place for it to be if it wanted to remain hidden or discreet or specifically wanted to avoid being seen by eyewitnesses.  it was almost as if it was trying to see how many people would take note if it sat there for hours... or maybe it's pilot just didn't care either way at all.  i will certainly study the nightly stars much closer from now on as for all i know this could have been there every night and i might never have noticed it.  but now that i know what to look for i suspect i could pick it up more quickly and will file another report if i am lucky enough to spot it again.
content.summary: Hovering black triangle for 90+ minutes, observed extensively but at high altitude during perseid meteor shower.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to pick up my room mate from work. i was on country club road heading east. in the sky almost directly east there was a bright light in the sky. having lived in roswell most of my life i am quite familiar with various types of air traffic and something about it struck me as odd. as i observed it i noticed it began to wobble. i watched it as well as i could (safely, given i was driving 45 mph) and something blue shot out of the direction of the object. it is still in the sky east of roswell right now at 11:28 local time. the blue ejection was sort of cone shaped, but looked like a series of circles that got larger towards the bottom... kind of like a snowman for lack of a better description. there were about 8-12 circles. this is a serious statement, not a joke or anything. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Bright white object with blue ejection.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just finished working out at the local gym and was walking home on august 2, 2010.  it was a very cloudy day with the potential of storms.  i looked up at the clouds when i was walking infront of the local bank and saw the clouds looked awesome so i quickly took a picture on my iphone and continued on my way.

two weeks later on august 14, 2010 i was looking through the pictures on my iphone when i noticed on the cloud picture, after the menu bar went away, that their was a weird object in between the hydro lines.  i really dont know how to explain this picture, it honestly doesnt look like a bird and thats the only thing that would be flying in the air because i know there were no plaines in the air at that time.
content.summary: Took a picture of some weird clouds and a couple weekes later i noticed there was a weird object in the picture i couldn't explain.

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog (spanky) out about 10:00m p.M., there was a cat in my aunts yard next door, he saw the cat, then looked up and started barking at the object. i looked up and said "**** **** what the **** is that? (3 words deleted--sgonzalez/cms). it looked like it was on fire, bright red, lava red, on top and orange underneath. it was lower then an airplane would be. i ran to call my son to come down and look at it, we were both saying that is no airplane. we followed it until it started pulsating, faster, then it was gone , and left a puff of black smoke.
content.summary: Went to take my dog outside he looked up and started barking at the object.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister carmen woke me up at 5:10 telling me that she saw the same lights we saw on 8/1/10 over walnut and 55 fwy, again!  she got to video tape about 3 seconds of the light before it dissapeared (out first video of the light is a lot longer)  it glowed slowly purple, red, blue and white lights.. and it seemed to be heading north again.

[youtube link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Red, purple, blue and whitish glowing.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Last night during the meteor shower, meteors were not the only things in the sky. my family and i went to a state park in sumter, south carolina to be secluded and watch the falling rocks but ended up watching something so much more. i am contacting mufon due to the fact i am not doubting what we saw could have been military, since an air force base is so close. the maneuverability of the aircrafts we watched was jaw dropping. 
at 2201 while lying in a field watching and waiting for meteors to streak across the clear sky, my wife noticed a blue-ish white light moving extremely high up in the sky. as it was entering the center of our field of view, another ���������aircraft��������� approached it from the opposite direction. they were tiny specks of light traveling quite a distance that we knew they were not meteors. as they reached one another, both stopped and the one from the left emitted a very bright light before dimming and becoming less obvious. both moved off in the directions they were originally traveling  at the same speed as before and vanished behind the clouds. moments later, a closer, but still far-off jet of some sort blinking white lights trekked across the sky before splitting into two aircraft, followed by a third. the first two began doing aerial acrobatics like you would see at an air show ��������� at one point crisscrossing one another at dangerously close intervals. this is where we saw the first parts of their amazing maneuverability such as their ability to fly in acute angles at such increased velocity, as one made a sharp v and headed in a different direction. while these two were playing, the third appeared to start giving chase before joining as part of the group. we noticed as they increased speed, their lights would blink faster and faster until they were nothing but a blur, such as a meteor with no tail. when they slowed, their white lights blinked less and turned to three red lights at a slight pause before they resumed flying right, circling to left and dropping to the v at a lower altitude. they did this many times. 
prior to seeing them, we had noticed numerous airplanes (regular ones). at approximately 2200, it seemed the area became a no-fly zone, until approximately 2235 when an airplane entered from the left, at which time, the unknown aircraft proceeded to flee the area, reappearing at a lower altitude, when the airplane had passed. they resumed their ���������acrobatics��������� for another approximately 15 minutes before leaving. these three aircraft made a loud, deep, growling engine noise��������� deeper than any combat aircraft i have encountered in my 5 years of service as an infantryman. i am unsure about what type of aircrafts these may have been, but i did see similar aircraft, to the first we witnessed, at extreme altitudes 56 miles away at my home in lexington, sc the night before. they appeared as dots in the sky with one brightening then separating, going in different directions, covering distances that would baffle you. i believe in reverse engineering that is kept from the public by the military. it is my belief these aircraft could possibly be proof of such. 

[witness name deleted/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Read full email sent to mufon, three star like objects in aerial acrobatics.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside playing with my newly modified infrared camcorder when this huge bright object in the sky went over.

[youtube links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Huge bright ufo captured in the sky over southampton, uk.

content.detailedDescription:
I had woken from my sleep, around 3:30 a.M. , and i noticed a very bright light shining through my window blinds. i got up to look to see what it was; upon moving a window blind, i saw a extremely bright light and heard a very loud screeching noise. i had then blacked out, and hadn't recalled the phenomina till recently. 

since then i have heard random loud screeching noises, but haven't seen the bright light since. unexplainably, i noticed that there was a mark and or marks, that were scarlike on my back. one was a big circle, the other two smaller, but unexplainable, unlike my other marks (moles) on my back. the clock i had set that night (with fresh batteries, since i had recently moved to a new address) had lost 6 hours that night.

i have only hinted at what has actually happened to my family, as not to scare them. i wish to remain anonymous, because i believe i have been abducted by something; whether alien or human.

                                                    
                               i want to believe(i am safe),
                                                       18:02
content.summary: Could not see, very bright.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in our kitchen talking at approx 2200hrs, my wife commented that she was looking at what she thought was a helecoptor over our house with what she thought was a spotlight (she could see it from her kitchen chair through our deck screen door.

my brother stood up and had a look and commented that he thought it was weird that it made no noise.

i have military experience with helecopters, para flairs and artillery flairs so i got up and stepped out on the deck to have a look (the rest were still in the house.  at first i thought i was looking at a bright orange flair but then i noticed it was moving over our neighbourhood from west to east.  we have a large military base and they fire artillery flairs to our south but their normally white and we can see them fall (not fly).

the object was semi-bright star shaped.  it made no noise at all and definately wasn't a flair or aircraft (no red/green or white flashing lights).  it flew towards cfb gagetown and then stopped in the air.  i yelled at my brother to come out and look and we watched it hover in the vicinity of the base for about 2 minutes and then it slowly started to fly again in a north east direction.  we watched it fly out of sight and it never changed shape or added color (bright orange).  when i checked my watch it was 2207hrs.

my wife asked if it could be a meteor but i said no because it moved, then hovered, then moved again.  it's speed wasn't fast but it was consistent (under mach 1).  it seemed to waver left to right slightly and it made no noise at all.  we have bell 412 choppers here flying all the time, some sea kings and eh 101s and you can hear them.  this made no sound at all.
content.summary: Bright orange moving star.

content.detailedDescription:
My family was in a trance, none of them have any memory of the encounter, but i do. i know it was a angel i talked to he had blonde hair and gray eyes. he told me do not fear, i replied i wasn't affraid. 4 -n 5 hours went by that i do not remember. then in 1994, i saw a show on television, it was called u.F.Os over telaviv.. the u.F. o. i saw had a sign depicting the trinity the new jeruselum on the new world. eph - 2 verse 2 satan is the prince of the power of the air (atmosphere). the first heaven is air where the birds fly the second heaven are the stars in the night sky, the third heaven is where god resides. the little gray goomers with the big eyes are satan's demons. the c.I.A. and hollywood made up the name e.T.S,  there are no such thing  as aliens, but people being abducted, are only being taken vbecause they do not have the holy spirit abidding in them. if they have the holy spirit the demons know who jesus is and they will not take you. i know without a shadow of a doubt the lord and the angels have given me this information, i did not study it. if you come to the lord the demons can't touch you. what i am saying is the truth all of my information is in the bible. my name is [name deleted/cms/tg]. i grew up in silverdale, wa and i will gladly explain what i know to those interested.

                 thank you
content.summary: The summer of 1958 my family and i had an encounter with a u. f.O.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:23pm i was outside and way up and to the west is where i saw it. the sky was still very well lit since it was early evening and i thought i heard jet noise so i looked up and didn't see it at first. then the object appeared out of nowhere so i thought, "oh, there's the jet". as it turned out the noise i heard stopped and was coming from a different direction anyway.

i observed the cylindrical/rectangular craft as it moved faster than what a jet would but steadily. i saw colored lights along the sides for the first time i believe which is also why i thought it was a plane at first but the lights did not pulsate or strobe.

it moved northward, did it's "flash of bright light thing" dimmed out and disappeared from sight. it's just what they do.
content.summary: Cylindrical craft and fireball across the sky in norhtern california.

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal day in taganga (santamarta - colombia)at the beach. i was taking some pictures of my friends and then i realized that there was a white shining around the sun, visible with uv filter lenses as i had on my sunglasses. so i decided to take some pictures of that using the inner nd filter of my cannon g11. when i replayed the pics on the visor of the camera i thought i was seeng a damaged pixel con the screen, but i zoomed and i found this triangular shaped "something". it's clearly too high to be a plane and too triangular for any known aircrafts. this picture has a little photoshop on it, just color and saturation corrections. i've kept the original for future studies if anyone's interested.
content.summary: Ufo photographed in taganga, santamarta -colombia.

content.detailedDescription:
While i was on the cellphone with a friend i was in my back yard pool side when i was looking up at the starry sky. i then saw a moving star which i knew was one of the celestial's i have seen for almost two months now.

this star moved northward at a semi fast pace when it brightened, like the others but this time it remained still or it stopped, brighter than it started out. usually when they do this it gets ready to go out into outer space but this time it stopped brightly lit as if it was waiting for me to see it or ... it felt like it was looking back at me.

i tried taking a snapshot with my cell phone but if you on it talking the camera wont function. so i hung up on my friend and tried to take the snapshot but as i readied the camera it began moving outward. i can tell because i have seen over 15 of these craft over the course of two months and they go outward as the ship brightens. it seems that this is what it does just before it takes off... the propulsion maybe?? 

anyway, this is daily now... i'll report later tonight about the sighting to come on friday the 13th... it should be a doozy! be on the lookout if you're in the redding area. look west all the way up and out to the northern sky.
content.summary: Moving star brightens, stops, waits then disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:30 on tuesday morning the 3rd of august we were standing in the kitchen when i happened to look at the back door and see a silver round craft towards the direction of pretoria east.  at first there was a vaporous cloud around it but then that dissipated and the craft remained in clear blue sky.  next thing a much smaller craft more like a sharp clear orb zoomed around the stationary craft.  we both had a sense of growing excitement in the realisation that we were witnessing something strange and ���������otherworldly���������.

whenever possible i now look out through the back door to try and verify if what we had witnessed was not a plane retreating into the distance and the light merely a reflection from the metal of the plane.  i also considered that i could have been a bird, yet i realise that in the 5 minutes in which we watched the craft there weren���������t any planes nor where there any birds.  the absence of birds interests me since in my observations since; the area seems full of bird life.

the craft lifted higher in the sky and then began to slowly head east.  we watched it until it faded from view.
content.summary: A shiny bright metallic object with a smaller brighter orb.

content.detailedDescription:
For the last month my neighbours and i have been going out in the township of melancthon ontario near our home town of shelburne.  the first pictures captured of the object was in daylight and there are many many wind turbines in the area.  it's almost as if they are attracted to them.  my neighbour took the pictures, the following night i went out with them and i also got some similar pictures but in the dark.  i also video taped.  some of the pictures my neighbour captured are without explanation as they are very bizarre almost like beams of light!  my one friend had an encounter with a being when she was 10 yrs old at belwood lake campgrounds not far from here.  last weekend we went there camping and we caught a very bizarre picture of her.  after taking many pictures none of them showed anything but us in the pic.  tonight, we went back out near the windmills and took photos and a taping of an object that looked circular and very bright.  when about to take a picture of it we can see it pulsing and jumping around, up, down and side to side.  what is this?  and why here?  i have also seen a really bright green orb across my street above my neighbours roof of the house, it was there and gone very fast.  2 nights ago we went out again and we were watching a plane in the night sky when we saw a bright green/blue orb like object fly by the plane extremely fast, making the plane look like it was standing still...Then it was gone!  please help us understand what all this means and why here??  thanks for you time and consideration!  

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms0.

i have many many more pictures i would like to share, please let me know how i can do this! :)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsing bright object/pulsing blue and red, moving away and toward us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying on a reclining chair in my back yard wondering if i could see the persid meteor shower (i didn't).  i did see a few sattelites in the sky.  i was lying on the shair for about 20-30 min and got up to face the back door when i saw a "huge" tringle of 5 lights with 1 additional light in front of it.  the lights were very faint and did not flash.  it seemed to be moving very quickly.  i only saw it for a few seconds and it moved out of sight.  i yelled for my wife to come but it had crossed the path of our house by then.  

my reaction was "that cant be what i think it is!"  it was really very surreal.  i've never seen anything like it.  

i tried to measure how big it was.  if i held my arm fully extended, the object would appear about .75" to 1" wide by 1-1.5" long.  we have helicopters and airplanes flying around all the time but this was very faint, silent and seemed like it was big!  also, i couldn't tell if it was solid or not (the area in between the lights was the same color as the sky - not darker).

after i saw the object i drew a picture of the lights (not very exciting) and tried to measure how big i thought the craft was, by laying back in the chair and extending my arm/fingers to guage the size.  if i held my arm fully extended, the object would appear about .75"-1" wide by 1-1.5" long (i revised the size down from the image attached).  we have helicopters and airplanes flying around all the time but this was very faint, silent and seemed like it was big!  also, i couldn't tell if it was solid or not (the area in between the lights was the same color as the sky - not darker).

i really don't think it was a conventional airplane or helicopter, as i didn't hear anything. it was much larger than airplanes appear in the sky, the light was very dim and it crossed the sky quickly.
content.summary: Silent, "large", triangular outline of lights in the sky (5 lights in shape of triangle with 1 light in front of the triangle).
